bug.author: albert-github
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => 4.3.0-dev documentation
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
Some "strange" formulas in the documentation, I'll give the reference to the documentation page plus an image showing the problem (and when necessary some text).
https://docs.opencv.org/4.3.0/d0/dcc/tutorial_non_linear_svms.html: backslash
affected: OpenCV 3.0.0 https://docs.opencv.org/4.3.0/d4/d86/group__imgproc__filter.html: remaining texttt command
affected: OpenCV 3.0.0 https://docs.opencv.org/4.3.0/d4/d86/group__imgproc__filter.html: remaining texttt command
affected: OpenCV 3.0.0 https://docs.opencv.org/4.3.0/d4/d86/group__imgproc__filter.html: different size underneath sum symbol
affected: OpenCV 3.0.0 https://docs.opencv.org/4.3.0/d9/d0c/group__calib3d.html: probably missing some \cdot around the E
affected: OpenCV 3.0.0 https://docs.opencv.org/4.3.0/da/dc5/group__gapi__filters.html: remaining texttt command
affected: OpenCV 4.0.0 https://docs.opencv.org/4.3.0/da/dc5/group__gapi__filters.html: different size underneath sum symbol
affected: OpenCV 4.0.0 https://docs.opencv.org/4.3.0/dc/d6b/group__video__track.html: twice warpMatrix
affected: OpenCV 3.0.0

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/alalek>@alalek</denchmark-link> , I'll try to fix this.
